name: 王謹誠
objective:
本課程在應用計算方法來解決工程問題。重點將放在理解各種數值方法背後的基本概念，使用 MATLAB 環境來實現基本數值方法，以及利用複雜的數值方法來建構 MATLAB 函數。
This course is to teach you how to apply computational methodologies to solve engineering problems when no analytical solution exists. Emphasis will be placed on understanding the basic concepts behind the various numerical methods, implementing basic numerical methods using the MATLAB structured programming environment, and utilizing more sophisticated numerical methods provided as built-in MATLAB functions.
